Package aeneas.views

The views package contains the classes which define and display state of the GUI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoardView.SquareClickListener
    listener for when squares are clicked
    DragSource
    Interface for things that can be dragged from
    RefreshListener
    An interface for a view that can be refreshed
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardView
    View class to display a board
    BuildLevelView
    Display the level builder.
    BuildSelectLevelView
    View for the selecting a level to edit
    BullpenView
    View class to draw a Bullpen.
    LevelWidgetView
    Abstract base class for widgets that edit parameters for levels
    LightningWidgetView
    Widget view for lightning levels.
    MainView
    The top level view class.
    PieceView
    View class for displaying a Piece
    PlayLevelView
    View used to display a level while playing it.
    PlaySelectLevelView
    View to show the list of levels that can be played.
    PuzzleWidgetView
    Widget for editing parameters of a puzzle level
    ReleaseNumView  
    ReleaseWidgetView
    Widget for editing parameters of release levels
    SquareView
    View class to display a single square
    ViewAchievementsView
    View used to display achievements page
    WelcomeView
    Starting view of the application, used to navigate to the build select level, play select level screen, or achievements screen.

Package aeneas.views Description

The views package contains the classes which define and display state of the GUI. It includes things like drawing the pieces, board, and setting up listeners for all the buttons, spinners, checkboxes, ect... It also contains the high-level MainView, which controls the toolbar on the top of every window.
